Huion H420 Digital Graphic Tablet USB Signature Pad with Wireless Drawing Pen

Description:
Huion Signature Pad H420 is a professional graphic drawing tool that simply packs everything needed. You can edit photos professionally wherever you want as its easy and convenient to bring along.
3 shortcut keys on the left side of the pad to activate your own habitual shortcuts and modifiers in each of your tablet applications which saves your time.

Features:

1. With ergonomic pen and textured surface.

2. Easy and convenient to use and carry.

3. Provide you with a platform to show your talent.

4. It is an indeed useful item especially for office workers.

5. Compact size with delicate design, it has good hand feeling.

6. Electromagnetic digitizer technology has been applied.

7. A wireless pen inside to make your operation more conveniently.

8. Compatible with all major graphics application: including Corel Painter, CorelDraw, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Fireworks, 3D MAX and so on.

9. Function as the cursor and the board as the screen, when you move the pen to the corner of the board, the cursor on your screen moves to the corner of said screen, etc.



Specifications:

1. Technology: Electromagnetic Digitizer 

2. Active Area: 4" x 2.23" 

3. Hand Input Resolution: 4000 LPI 

4. Report Rate: 200 RPS 

5. Pressure Sensitivity: 2048 Levl 

6. Supply Voltage: DC 5V 

7. Power consumption: 0.35W

name: B·∫£ng M·∫°ch Th·ª≠ Breadboard 400 ƒêi·ªÉm
description:
400 Point Breadboard Bread Board Solderless PCB test Board


The 400 Tie Point Interlocking Solderless Breadboard is a cute half size breadboard, good for small projects. It is 8.2cm x 6.2cm in size with a standard double-strip in the middle and two power rails on both sides. You can pull the power rails off easily to make the breadboard as thin as 3.5cm and stick it onto an protoshield. You can also cut these in half with a saw to create 2 tiny breadboards, or "snap" these breadboards together either way to make longer or wider breadboards.
Specification
‚Ä¢ 400 Tie Point
‚Ä¢ Self adhesive
‚Ä¢ Can be interlocked for larger projects
‚Ä¢ 2 power lanes
‚Ä¢ Horizontal: 1-30
‚Ä¢ Vertical: A-J
‚Ä¢ Dimensions: 8.2cm x 6.2 cm
